Articles.Content:
I'm gonna be in florida until monday so I won't be able to finish my battle with you turd until monday.

lol, that can be taken as an insult

I'm gonna be in florida until monday so I won't be able to finish my battle with you turd until monday.

No problem. I can wait.

In the mean time anybody else up for a friendly game? I'm ready to try out my next generation of craft with new missiles. I can't wait for the parts being shown off in the ARM pack right now!

lol, that can be taken as an insult

Hey, I'm proud of my callsign. I picked it up from my squad while in Iraq. We also had a Princess, Furby, and Birdsh**so Turd Ferguson was awesome in comparison.

As for the rules... I'd like to see it so that projectiles can have probe cores, but the engines on the projectile must be fired at the same time it is decoupled from the core component of the craft, and only within 2.4km of the target.

Should solve any torpedo abuse issues.

No problem. I can wait.

In the mean time anybody else up for a friendly game? I'm ready to try out my next generation of craft with new missiles. I can't wait for the parts being shown off in the ARM pack right now!

Hey, I'm proud of my callsign. I picked it up from my squad while in Iraq. We also had a Princess, Furby, and Birdsh**so Turd Ferguson was awesome in comparison.

As for the rules... I'd like to see it so that projectiles can have probe cores, but the engines on the projectile must be fired at the same time it is decoupled from the core component of the craft, and only within 2.4km of the target.

Should solve any torpedo abuse issues.

that would basicly make the probe core useless

Nope, it allows the SAS unit and onboard liquid fuel engines to keep the projectile on a straight heading.

Which is a big deal when firing projectiles in pairs or clusters from the craft.

I think its time for a new page. And a reset of the rules.

I agree with this one,the thread is becoming too hard to navigate.I already plan to cut the rules back a bit.

edit: or the most active players get together and vote on the rules for this (or a new) page. That way we can try to eliminate any questions new players can come up with

No.That's how the rules became a jumbly mess of confusion.

Imma also going to make the NASA pack compulsory just so we don't have compatibility issues(no idea why you wouldn't download it)

Edited March 24, 2014 by Spartwo

I've been really busy this weekend, but I'll do my turn when I get home.

I've been really busy this weekend, but I'll do my turn when I get home.

No hurryÃ¢â‚¬Â¦I didn't sleep well last night so I'm in no mood to play my turn right now anyway

Hunter Leader attacked PGS Joshua. Three shots. Seems to have knocked off one of the towers.

Persistent

If we were battling in a larger SOI, I would call PGS Joshua dead. Daemon's attack with Hunter Leader left her without engines. However she still has tons of RCS trusters and a good supply of missiles. So even though her wings were clipped, she won't die off quietly

I moved her to attack Hunter 1.

I used 2 of her 8 remaining missiles to attack.

The first missile destroyed the canopy but the kerbal pilot survived and is floating away in orbit.

The second missileÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.was devastating

Gotta love it when the words "no target" appear.

http://www./view/td6zczh3zo36cmi/persistent(2).sfs
I can play this out, but I'm several ships behind. If you'll accept, I concede.

I can play this out, but I'm several ships behind. If you'll accept, I concede.

I accept. Thanks for playing. We should do it again sometime

I accept. Thanks for playing. We should do it again sometime

Yeah. My armour is kind of crap. I think my parts are still clipping with other parts. I have an idea now how to fix that.

Yeah. My armour is kind of crap. I think my parts are still clipping with other parts. I have an idea now how to fix that.

I just updated the Salvation so its now in the MKIII model. It has slightly less fuel while having new weapons that pack more of a punch. Also I fixed the probe core problem

It has slightly less fuel

Meanwhile over here...

MOAR FUEL!!!
I'm lowering the delta-V on my ships. Looking into more Ion power now that the thrust has been quadrupled.
I take it everyone is waiting for the ARM update to come out before battles continue?

Pretty much.I got a bit sidetracked over mothers day,The new thread should be up in a couple of hours.Post only one reply when it goes up as a rolecall(and also somewhere to put all your ships in a gallery if one so chooses)

I know I'm sort of a lurker here, but is it possible for me to join in on these overly awesome battles?

I can make a company if need be, and I have some... interesting warships fueled and ready to go.

Pretty much.I got a bit sidetracked over mothers day,The new thread should be up in a couple of hours.Post only one reply when it goes up as a rolecall(and also somewhere to put all your ships in a gallery if one so chooses)

Of course!!

I can make a company if need be.

No need.

I have some... interesting warships fueled and ready to go.

Ok so how does a person post a album from imgur?

(Imgur)code eg.WAR3G1(/imgur)
Ok and when the new tread comes up we do our name, team name, and a album of out current ships correct?

Correct,as well as wins/losses/draws.I'll leave this thread open for a while to let any questions be directed here.

If ,like daemon, you use a different host you can use SPOILERS.
